friends.name: Alex Johnson
friends.description: Adventure enthusiast who loves hiking and rock climbing. Always planning the next outdoor expedition and sharing amazing stories from his travels.

friends.name: Marcus Williams
friends.description: Tech guru and coffee connoisseur. Can debug any code problem and knows all the best local coffee shops. Great at explaining complex tech concepts.

friends.name: David Chen
friends.description: Fitness coach and meal prep master. Helps everyone stay motivated with their health goals and always has the best nutrition advice.

friends.name: Jake Martinez
friends.description: Artist and musician who brings creativity to everything. Can play multiple instruments and is always working on his next artistic project.

friends.name: Ryan O'Connor
friends.description: Sports fanatic and trivia champion. Knows stats for every sport and is the go-to person for organizing game nights and sports viewing parties.

friends.name: Chris Thompson
friends.description: Chef and food blogger who creates amazing dishes. Always experimenting with new recipes and hosting dinner parties with incredible home-cooked meals.
